(ZH) Wǒ Nǐ Tā Yéye Nǎinai _______ zǎocān chī shénme ?

Reset Check

On the next slides:

  • To fill the blanks, drag words to be used and drop onto the correct blank.
  • To clear a filled blank, click on the cross next to the word.
  • Click on "Check" to check your answers. Correct answers are marked green and incorrect ones are red.
  • Clicn on "Reset" to reset the game including clearing all blanks.
